title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4.12 - Solicitation of tips prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4.12 - Solicitation of tips prohibited

State Regulations

No person registered by the commission shall solicit, request, require, demand or exact any tip or gratuity or anything of value for
any work performed by himself or by any other registered person in his capacity
as such registered person, including but not limited to the handling of baggage
and the loading and unloading of trucks. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
